  var VARIABLE = {

    className: 'variable', begin: '\\b[gtps][A-Z]+[A-Za-z0-9_\\-]*\\b|\\$_[A-Z]+',
    relevance: 0
  };
  var COMMENT_MODES = [
    hljs.C_BLOCK_COMMENT_MODE,

    hljs.COMMENT('[^:]//', '$')
  ];
  var TITLE1 = hljs.inherit(hljs.TITLE_MODE, {

      {begin: '\\b_*rig[A-Z]+[A-Za-z0-9_\\-]*'},
